column1: Department for Work & Pensions Corporate & Shared Services

column41: There were no consultants in this month. Salary cost has decreased in comparrison to previous months. The reason for this is that the PDS bonus has been paid using monies that have been accrued in the previous financial year. This has artificially reduced the in month salary cost.

Remploy do not use Civil Service Grades. Non-consolidated performance payments relate to a former Weekly Paid Employee's Bonus Scheme for Remploy's factory employees and no longer relate to performance.  Remploy is in the process of gradually consolidating these payments into basic pay
